sections.installation:
1. Upload the digital-service-provider-crm directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin settings through the ‘Settings’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:

Answer to the question goes here.

Can I customize the plugin?

Yes, you can customize the plugin by following the instructions provided in the documentation.
